question: Will Ketanji Jackson Brown receive 53 or more votes in favor of her confirmation to the U.S. Supreme Court?
description:
This market asks if Ketanji Brown Jackson will receive 53 or more votes in favor of her confirmation for the Supreme Court of the United States (SCOTUS) by December 31, 2022.

If 53 or more votes in favor of confirming Ketanji Brown Jackson to the SCOTUS are recorded by December 31, 2022, 11:59:59 PM ET, this market will resolve to “Yes”. Otherwise, this market will resolve to “No”.

Outcomes of committee votes, hearings, reports, cloture votes, or other procedural votes will have no impact on the resolution of this market. This market only concerns a first such Senate confirmation vote for Ketanji Brown Jackson to the SCOTUS.

The primary resolution source is the official vote tally reported by the United States Senate (https://www.senate.gov/legislative/nominations/SupremeCourtNominations1789present.htm), however other credible reporting may also be used. Once the vote has been closed and the result of the vote announced, any request by any senator to add, remove, or alter a vote will not be considered in the resolution of this market, regardless of any change to the official vote tally reported by the primary resolution source or any other source.

question: Will NATO declare a No Fly-Zone over any Ukrainian territory by April 30, 2022?
description:
This market asks whether the North American Treaty Organization (NATO) will declare a no fly-zone over the airspace of any territory designated by the United Nations as Ukrainian by April 30, 2022.

If NATO declares a no fly-zone over the airspace of any territory designated by the United Nations as Ukrainian between the date of this market's inception, March 8, 2022, 12:00:00 PM ET, and April 30, 2022, 11:59:59 PM ET, this market will resolve to "Yes". Otherwise this market will resolve to "No".

If NATO declares the no-fly zone by April 30, 2022, even if it goes into effect afterwards, it will still suffice to resolve this market to "Yes."

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information released by NATO (https://www.nato.int/cps/en/natohq/news_room.htm), however other credible news sources will also be used.

question: Will the Moscow Stock Exchange market (MOEX) open for trading by March 25, 2022?
description:
Trading on the Moscow Stock Exchange (MOEX) has been suspended each day since Thursday, February 24, 2022. This market asks whether MOEX will be open for stock trading again by end of day March 25, 2022.

If MOEX opens for stock trading between the date of this market's inception, March 8, 2022, and March 25, 2022, 4:00:00 PM ET (inclusive), this market will resolve to "Yes". Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

The resolution source for this market will be Yahoo Finance (https://finance.yahoo.com/quote/IMOEX.ME). If the resolution source is unavailable, it will be checked every 8 hours for a week, to see if MOEX was open within the market timeframe. If still unavailable after a week, other credible sources will be checked instead.

question: Will the price of a barrel of crude oil reach $150 by March 25, 2022?
description:
This is a market on whether the price of crude oil will reach $150.00 USD by market close on March 25, 2022. 

If the price of a barrel of oil reaches $150.00 or greater between the date of this market's inception, March 8, 2022, 12:00:00 PM ET and market close on March 25, 2022, this market will resolve to “Yes”. Otherwise, this market will resolve to “No”.

The resolution source for this market will be Yahoo Finance’s reporting of the values offered by the New York Mercantile Exchange (NYMEX), found at (https://finance.yahoo.com/quote/CL%3DF/history). 

Resolution will be based on the values listed in the column labelled “High” for rows within the market timeframe. If the resolution source is unavailable at market close on March 25, 2022, another credible source will be used.

question: Will Brittney Griner play in her next scheduled game?
description:
Brittney Griner is a Woman's National Basketball Association (WNBA) player with the Phoenix Mercury. She was recently arrested for possession of cannabis oil while attempting to board a flight leaving Russia, and is presently in the center of a diplomatic dispute between the Russian Federation and the United States of America.

This market asks if Brittney Griner will play in the Las Vegas Aces vs. Phoenix Mercury WNBA game scheduled for Friday, May 6, 2022, 10:00:00 PM ET.

This market will resolve to "Yes" if Brittney Griner plays in the Las Vegas Aces vs. Phoenix Mercury WNBA game scheduled for Friday, May 6, 2022, 10:00:00 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

The primary resolution source for this market will be Fox Sports (https://www.foxsports.com/wnba/brittney-griner-player-game-log), however other credible sources will be considered. If this game is delayed the resolution of this market will be delayed up to May 13, 2022, 11:59:59 PM ET. If the game has still not been played and finished by that time, this market will resolve to "No."

question: Will the price of $ETH be above $2,600 on March 15, 2022?
description:
This is a market on if the price of $ETH will be above $2,600 in USD on March 15, 2022. 

This market will resolve to “Yes” if Ethereum ($ETH) has a candlestick closing price of $2,600.01 or more, as per the resolution source, on March 15, 2022, 12pm ET, and “No” otherwise.

The resolution source for this market will be prices listed on CoinGecko (https://www.coingecko.com/en/coins/ethereum).

This market will resolve according to the “C” (i.e. closing price) listed for the candle titled “Tue 15 March 2022, 12:00:00”, with the “Price” tab selected, in the Eastern Time Zone. Note, this 12:00:00 candle lists the opening price for 11:30:00 AM ET and the closing price for 12:00:00 PM ET.

The check will be at 12:30 PM ET, March 15, 2022.

If the Detroit Pistons win, the market will resolve to “Pistons.”

question: FIDE World Chess Grand Prix 2022: Will Anish Giri win Leg #2?
description:
The FIDE Grand Prix 2022 is a series of three chess tournaments and the final qualifier for the Candidates Tournament, played between February 3 and April 4 2022 in Berlin, Germany and Belgrade, Serbia.  The top two finishers will qualify for the Candidates Tournament 2022, which is the final qualification stage for the World Chess Championship 2023. It’s organized by World Chess. 24 of the world’s top players take part in the Series.

This market is about the winner of the FIDE Grand Prix 2022 Tournament Leg #2 Knockout Round, which runs from March 9 to March 14 2022.

This market will resolve to "Yes", if Anish Giri wins Leg #2, and to "No" otherwise.

If for any reason the winner of the pool is not decided by March 21 (11:59:59 PM ET), this market will resolve to "No".

question: Will Marine Le Pen win 2nd place in the first round of the 2022 French presidential election?
description:
This market will resolve to “Yes” if Marine Le Pen wins second place in the first round of the 2022 French Presidential election. Otherwise, this market will resolve to “No”. 

If no election occurs in 2022, then this market will resolve “No”.

The first round of the 2022 French presidential election will be held on April 10, 2022. 

Should no candidate win a majority of the vote in the first round of the 2022 French presidential election, the 2nd place candidate as determined by election rules will be used.

If there is a tie for the 2nd place position in the first round of the 2022 French presidential election and Marine Le Pen is in a 2nd place position, this market will resolve to "Yes".

The main resolution sources for this market will be https://www.legifrance.gouv.fr/ and https://www.interieur.gouv.fr/, however credible media reports will also be used.
